entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
